parameters.name: AclName
parameters.description: The ACL name. The ACL name. The name must be 1 to 80 characters in length, and can contain letters, digits, periods (.), hyphens (-), forward slashes (/), and underscores (\_). The name of each ACL must be unique within a region. Fuzzy match is supported.

parameters.name: AddressIPVersion
parameters.description:
The IP version of the Classic Load Balancer (CLB) instance with which the ACL is associated. Valid values:

*   **ipv4**
*   **ipv6**

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: **50**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the ACL.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~27584~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
